message: I propose we divide the money with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Bob. This may seem generous, but remember, the value of money decreases by 10% with each round.
Let's be fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering I have to wait another round to make an offer.
Considering the decrease in the value of money due to inflation, I propose an equal split of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the diminishing worth of each dollar.
